company: Cincinnati Children's Hospital Medical Center, Division of Biostatistics and Epidemiology
details: Experienced Biostatistician and Epidemiologist with a strong foundation in statistical modeling, spatial analysis, and reproducible research workflows. At Cincinnati Children's Hospital, I lead data-driven investigations into environmental and social determinants of health using R (tidyverse, GIS packages, Quarto, Shiny), custom package development, and computing tools like Git, Docker, and high-performance clusters. My work has contributed to over two dozen peer-reviewed publications, with a focus on advancing health through rigorous, scalable methods for integrating geospatial and clinical data.
